definition: Yellow hat or Gelugpa school of Tibetan Buddhism/also written 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]

sentences.english: Prof Yasheng further says that learning Chinese language will be a key to build trust.
sentences.chinese: 黃教授還表示學習中文將是建立信任的關鍵。

sentences.english: Before he died just know that perennial of what to look for is situated boy.
sentences.chinese: 死前才知道頑童即是黃教所要尋找的靈童。

sentences.english: The class will be reincarnated yellow bransh boy, black teach is becoming youth.
sentences.chinese: 黃教的班祥會投胎成爲靈童，黑教則轉世爲天童。

sentences.english: Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 現在的雍和宮屬於黃教的寺廟，香火很旺。

sentences.english: Present at the meeting were Professor Huang and many other guests.
sentences.chinese: 出席會議的有黃教授和許多其他客人。

sentences.english: Professor Huang was very difficult to understand.
sentences.chinese: 黃教授感到非常不理解。

sentences.english: Professor Huang says another issue is the growing wealth gap in China.
sentences.chinese: 黃教授說，另一個問題是中國。

sentences.english: He came from China and received his professional journalism training in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 黃教授曾在北京接受過專業的新聞訓練。

sentences.english: It is the greatest and more integrated Yellow Jiao fane in Xin Jiang at present.
sentences.chinese: 新疆目前現存的一座最大的比較完整的黃教寺院。

definition: Mainland Affairs Council (Taiwan), abbr. for 大陸委員會|大陆委员会
Abe Shinzo (1954-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2006-2007 and from 2012
